channel.title: Tetris on Welcome to My Site!
channel.description: Recent content in Tetris on Welcome to My Site!

item.title: I finally beat Tetris!
item.description: I’ve finally done it. I’ve beaten the game Tetris. More specifically, Atari 2-player arcade Tetris, which is the best version of Tetris ever released (in my opinion) and the one that was available in arcades before Nintendo secured the rights to the game from the Soviet Union. A few years ago, my daughter and I picked up a Taito arcade cabinet that I restored to play Tetris using the original Atari arcade game printed circuit board (PCB).
